icon.name: Icon
icon.hint: The icon to show in the HUD

hudColumn.name: HUD Column
hudColumn.hint: Which HUD column to place the button in

hudTopBottom.name: HUD Top/Bottom
hudTopBottom.hint: Where to place the button in the column

riderLock.name: Should riders be locked to mounts?
riderLock.hint: If enabled, riders will be unable to move seperately from their mount until dismounted.

riderRotate.name: Should riders rotate with mounts?
riderRotate.hint: If enabled, rider rotation will be updated to match mount rotation

shouldChat.name: Send messages to chat
shouldChat.hint: Should chat messages about mounting/carrying and dismounting/dropping be sent to chat?

mountMsg.name: Mount Message Format
mountMsg.hint: How mounting chat messages should be formatted if enabled. (use {rider} and {mount} for name substitution)

dismountMsg.name: Dismount Message Format
dismountMsg.hint: How dismounting chat messages should be formatted if enabled. (use {rider} and {mount} for name substitution)
